schema.title: Response Get Test Results V1 Test Executions  Id  Test Results Get

parameters.name: silent

schema.description: If true, omit returning created reruns in the response body. Speeds up bulk operations, as the rerun schema contains a lot of information and returning many reruns can be slow. Required when creating reruns with test result filters.
schema.title: Silent

parameters.description: If true, omit returning created reruns in the response body. Speeds up bulk operations, as the rerun schema contains a lot of information and returning many reruns can be slow. Required when creating reruns with test result filters.

get.description: Get latest artefact builds of an artefact together with their test executions

schema.title: Response Get Artefact Builds V1 Artefacts  Artefact Id  Builds Get

get.description:
Returns a csv report detailing all artefacts within a given date range. Together
with their test executions and test results in csv format.

Returns a csv report detailing all test executions within a given date range.
Together with their artefact and environment details in csv format.

schema.title: Response Get Reported Issues V1 Test Cases Reported Issues Get

get.description:
Returns test cases as a flat list with their template IDs.

Template ID represents the generic test (e.g., "disk/stats_name")
Test case name is the specific instance (e.g., "disk/stats_nvme0n1")
Multiple test cases can share the same template ID but have different names.

parameters.name: q

schema.description: Search term for test case names
schema.title: Q

parameters.description: Search term for test case names

schema.title: Families

schema.title: Offset

get.description:
Search test results across artefacts using flexible filters.

This endpoint uses a single optimized query with window functions to get both
the total count and paginated results in one database round trip.

schema.description: Filter by artefact families (e.g., charm,snap)
schema.title: Families

parameters.description: Filter by artefact families (e.g., charm,snap)

schema.description: Filter by artefact names
schema.title: Artefacts

schema.description: Filter by whether the artefact is archived
schema.title: Artefact Is Archived

schema.title: Environments

parameters.description: Filter by environment names

previous_results.title: Previous Results
previous_results.description: The last 10 test results matched with the current test execution. The items are sorted in descending order, the first test result is the most recent, while the last one is the oldest one.
